prefercite.p: Hopi Traditionalist Movement papers(AZ 374). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: This movement opposed policies of Hopi Tribal Council, Peabody Coal Company, Indian Claims Commission, and others which threatened traditional Hopi land and life.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of correspondence, transcripts of meetings, clippings, legal papers, and printed material published by members of the movement.
